title: L’Etudiant Study Abroad fairÂ
description:
The British Council is looking for anyone interested in helping them out with their stand at the Lâ€™Etudiant Study Abroad fair that will take place on Sat 8th December at VIPARIS, Espace Champerret, (Rue Jean Ostreicher 75017 Paris).

The British Council will have a stand there for the whole day. There will be a British Council member of staff on the stand throughoutÂ and they would find it very useful to have extra help from people who have had experience in studying in a UK university. Your task will consist in helping to answer all types of questions from students about studying in the UK. YouÂ Â would only need to be on the stand for half a day, from 10 am to 2pm or from 2pm to 6pm.
The British Councill will be delighted if any CamSoc members were able to join them. If you are interested, please contact Cristina Smith on cristina.smith@britishcouncil.fr or 01 49 55 73 34.
